Pre-Game Insights: The Cavaliers have covered an NBA best 25 of their first 34 games and are clicking on all cylinders.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cavaliers (30-4) lead the league in offensive efficiency and are averaging 122.7 points per game.
Cleveland F Isaac Okoro has been sidelined for the last two weeks with a sprained AC joint in his right shoulder.
Others: The Hornets (7-26) are looking to snap a nine-game losing streak and own the second worst overall record in the Eastern Conference.
